general_advisory: Light to moderate rainfall may occur on Saturday & Sunday with generally cloudy to overcast sky. Keep harvested crops safe from rain. Make provisions for draining excess rainwater. Maintain crop health and prevent diseases.

advisory: Prepare wet nursery seed beds for paddy.
Divide nursery area into smaller plots.
Sow sprouted seeds with appropriate spacing.
Plant sugarcane in well-drained soil during November to February.
Ensure good irrigation facilities for sugarcane.
Control Fruit and shoot borer by spraying Neem-based pesticide.
Follow alternate spray schedule for effective pest control.
Apply borax for Browning or Brown rot prevention.
Spray Boron micronutrient at appropriate stages.
